name: pnp-list-formatting-grouped-accordion-cards
title: Grouped Accordion Cards with Hover Details
shortDescription: Displays grouped items as modern cards with expandable accordion headers and hoverable detail panels.
longDescription: This sample uses SharePoint List View Formatting to render grouped items as visually rich cards with header images, colored accents, and hoverable detail panels.
It leverages SharePoint's built-in group-by behavior and @group tokens to simulate an accordion-style expand and collapse experience.
Each group header includes an image, group title, and item count, while rows show task details, color indicators, and a dynamic hover card for quick context.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: Learn how to use SharePoint List View Formatting to create modern card views, grouped layouts, and interactive hover experiences using JSON.
